io.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLExecutor<S,B,P extends io.zero88.jooqx.SQLPreparedQuery<B>,RS,C extends SQLResultCollector<RS>>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - Type of Vertx SQL client. Might be SqlClient or SQLClient
    B - Type of Vertx SQL bind value holder
    RS - Type of Vertx SQL result set holder
    C - Type of SQL result set collector
    All Superinterfaces:
    SQLBatchExecutor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LegacyJooqx, LegacyJooqxTx, io.zero88.jooqx.LegacySQLImpl.LegacyInternal<S>, ReactiveJooqx, ReactiveJooqxBase<S>, ReactiveJooqxConn, ReactiveJooqxTx

    public interface SQLExecutor<S,B,P extends io.zero88.jooqx.SQLPreparedQuery<B>,RS,C extends SQLResultCollector<RS>>
extends SQLBatchExecutor
    Represents for an executor that executes jOOQ query on Vertx SQL client connection
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    LegacyJooqx, ReactiveJooqxBase, SQLBatchExecutor

        handler - a async result handler
